help.title: :robot: Command help
help.description:
>>> Optional argument is **`[]`**
Required argument is **`<>`**

For more help with commands **type `%shelp [command]`**
help.no_description: %s This command doesn't have a description.
help.prefix.args: <new prefix should be larger than 1 and less than 8 symbols>
help.stop.description: Stop a music and clear a queue
ping.title: Ping?
about.title: :thinking: Who am I?
about.description:
Hello! My name is **Sonata**! I was created by [%s](%s) over a cup of tea and eight hours of hard work at workspace.

> **What I can to do?**
It's a good question. I can't do anything yet. :+1:
My version: **%s**
Help with translate on another language! **[`Click here for redirect to GitHub.`](https://github.com/vlfz/sonata-locales)**
error.title: %s An error has occurred!
error.description.no_permissions:
Sorry, but you are not allowed to use this command because you don't have this permissions:
> **%s**
error.description.no_prefix: Prefix cannot contain more than 8 characters.
error.description.no_color:
HEX-code is not provided, or HEX-code was incorrect.

> Maybe you forget type `#` to the beginning of the command.
> You can pick a color in this website: **[`www.color-hex.com`](https://www.color-hex.com)**
error.description.cooldown:
This command has a cooldown.!
> Try again in **%s**
error.description.stack_error:
An unexpected error has occurred! **I'm so sorry! >___<**
I have already sent information about error to my developers. It may well be corrected soon.
error.description.stack_song_error:
An unexpected error has occurred on song playing progress! **I'm so sorry! >___<**
I have already sent information about error to my developers. It may well be corrected soon.
error.description.command_disabled: The command is disabled. Maybe it is in the process of implementation, or the developers are fixing a bug.
error.play.description.not_connected: You must be in voice channel for command execution.
error.play.description.not_connected_to_: You must be in voice channel with me!
error.play.description.no_args: Please, type a name or video URL from Youtube.
play.title: ðŸŽµ Music! >w<
play.description.playlist: %s All tracks from playlist **%s** added to queue!
play.description.added: %s Track with name **%s** added to queue!
push.play.empty_queue: â„¹ï¸ Queue is empty, i'm quit! See you later! >w<
push.play.quit-from-voice: â„¹ï¸ All members leave from voice channel, so i'm too quit! See you later! >w<
error.hug_cuddle.description.no_user: Please, specify a member. I need to know who must be hugged >w<
hug_cuddle.author: %s is hugging %s
hug_cuddle.description: This is so cute and harmless! >w<
error.kiss.description.no_user: Please, specify a member. Please show who must be kissed >////<
error.kiss.description.self_user: You should get kisses from another people, user!~ >///<
kiss.title: %s is kissing %s
error.pat.description.no_user: Please, specify a member. Please, who me who needs to pet a head :>
error.pat.description.self_user: Good, now take a cookie from the table, sniff it and put it back
pat.title: %s is petting %s
error.poke.description.no_user: I... Don't like do things like this but... Who needs to be poked?
error.poke.description.self_user:
This is a pimple in your face... Or it's a cookie crumb
Oh, you poking yourself. Okay, but specify someone but not yourself >w<
poke.title: %s is poking %s
error.slap.description.no_user: Fights is not good, please be gentle and show me your offender
error.slap.description.self_user: DON'T HARM YOURSELF PLEASE! You won't make the world better if you will harm yourself! >~<
slap.title: %s is slapping %s
slap.description: Stop fighting! You can't solve a problem by fists. Diplomacy is your best friend >____<
sad.title: %s fells
